column1: alice w. smith| alice w. smith departed this life on june 7
column4: 1926. she was preceded in death by her husband
column7: carliss taborn. she is survived by her children
column16: 1 great great great grandchild and devoted friends
column17: linda pierceson and brenda hale. a funeral service will be held 12 noon
column21: at pilgrim baptist church. the interment will follow in williams memorial park. the family will receive friends one hour prior to the service. friends may call at serenity thursday
